description: An audio player with an interface similar to Winamp or XMMS. See also: clementine, ncmpcpp, cmus. More information: https://qmmp.ylsoftware.com.

useCases.description: Start or stop the currently playing audio:
Seek [f]or[w]ar[d]s or [b]ack[w]ar[d]s a specific amount of time in seconds:
[inc]rease or [dec]rease the volume of the currently playing audio by 5%:
